title: 96 Pieces Hair Perm Rods, Cold Wave Rods Plastic Perming Rods Heatless Curlers Rollers with 2 Steel Pintail Comb Rat Tail Comb for Hairdressing Styling Tools (Blue, 0.35 Inch/ 0.9 cm)
features: Abundant quantity: you will receive 96 pieces long hair perm rods in classic blue color, and 2 pieces stainless steel rat tail combs in total, nice combinations for you to diy your favorite curly hair, you can also share it with your family and friends to enjoy the joyful diy process

Detailed dimension: each plastic perming rod measures approx. 3.23 inches/ 8.2 cm in length and approx. 0.35 inch/ 0.9 cm in diameter, appropriate size for you to apply and create different curls as you like

Simple to apply: just use the pintail comb to separate a small strand of wet hair, wrap it on the rods, then use rubber band to fix it, no need heating, so it won't hurt your hair, wait for a while and you can get a charming curly hair, you can also adjust the direction when rolling your hair on the rods and you can create various styles of hair waves

Heatless and harmless: our heatless curlers rollers are made of quality plastic material, durable and flexible to use, their heatless style can bring you an effortless and safe using experience, won't damage your natural hair, the several holes of the rollers can achieve a better saturation, practical to design some beautiful wavy, fluffy, curly hair and more
Diverse occasions: these cold wave rods are easy to operate, no need other tools, you can create exquisite hairstyles at home and at anytime, good for home, hair salon, barber and more
description: 96 Pieces hair perm rods, 0.35 inch/ 0.9 cm cold wave rods plastic perming rods heatless curlers rollers with 2 steel pintail comb rat tail comb for hairdressing styling tools, blue  Feature:  Steps of applications: 1. Use the rat tail comb to separate a small strand of slightly damp or dry hair. 2. Wrap it on the rods and fix it with the rubber band. 3. Maintain it for 30 minutes to 1 hours. 4. Use a hairdryer and the wave will form faster.  Wide applicability: These cold wave rods are applicable for most hairstyles, like naturally curly or straight hair, you can use them to diy waves, curly hair with vintage style, air bangs and other shaped curls.  Specification: Material: plastic, stainless steel Length: approx. 3.23 inches/ 8.2 cm Diameter: approx. 0.35 inch/ 0.9 cm Color: blue  Package include: 96 x Hair perm rods 2 x Pintail comb  Note: Pointed parts include, please use it carefully and keep away from little kids. Manual measurement, please allow slight errors on size. The colors may exist slight difference due to different screens.
